column4: im having the hd problem with way to many unload/load cycles when on battery
removing wicd is like removing iwconfig or ifconfig. Why remove it?

when i unplug AC power the harddisk is parked to frequent so an audible click is heard, the "bug" seems to be old, https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/pm-utils/+bug/59695, but i cant find any efficient fixes for maverick
